La parution de Half life 2, a été pour moi une autre explosion de joie. On apprends alors que l'histoire de Half life dans les méandres de Cité 17 ne se ridiculise en rien. En effet on retrouve alors tout un récit qui du premier abords semble facile de compréhension, cependant toute la complexité de l'histoire nous est révélée après avoir combattu plus d'une fois le Dr. Wallace Breen ou après avoir traversé plusieurs fois Ravenholm. C'est un vrai délice dramatique que de faire et refaire ces deux premiers volets.

Les deux volets qui suivent, c'est à dire Half life 2 : episode one et Half life 2 : episode two, ne font que confirmer mon points de vue sur cette formidable saga. Selon moi l'univers d'Half life est du même niveau que celle de Star wars et est même bien plus intéressante. Le travail des personnages notamment celui d'Alyx Vance nous transporte véritablement du début à la fin. La personnalité d'Alyx "déteint" sur le personnage de Gordon qui nous permet alors de ne plus déifier le célèbre Gordon Freeman et lui confère alors un visage plus humain. 
De plus l'orientation prise autour du G-man est fabuleuse, le secret autours de ce personnage qui nous accompagne (malgré nous) tout au long des chapitres de la série est intense. Ce qui nous amène a vouloir en connaître vraiment plus sur ce personnage.

Okay, please read the full review as my feelings are complex.

The game felt like a tech demo or a pitch and utilized the source engine like a huge selling point. It was forced. Puzzle making in no way matched the first. The story was only sub par and veichles weren't anything special.

But play it for the ending, thats when it gets its valve charm back and has Scale, good establishing of motives and characters,
fluent combat, good puzzles and is fun.

Buy it because its valve, and you have to in order to get the story but otherwise, dont touch this please.
GOAT

[h1]An Experience That Just Screams Quality // Recommended for absolutely everyone with a PC[/h1]

+ Uses the sacred & beloved Source engine, which runs beautifully on just about any computer today
+ Thanks in large part to the heavily optimized engine, visuals & environments have actually aged quite well
+ Extremely compelling plot & world-building; to say the game is immersive would be a gross understatement
+ Nonplayable characters are bolstered by a combination of excellent writing, stellar voice acting, & adequate development overall
+ Famously excellent ambient sound design
+ Features some fantastically creative weapons & tools to enjoy
+ Puzzles are basic, but effectively & implemented with a distinct subtlety
+ The game is very, very well paced from start to finish

- Ends on a frustrating cliffhanger with (apparently) no direct sequel to look forward to
- The main character himself enjoys almost no real character building, in stark contrast to those around him

Даже спустя 10 лет после выхода игра не перестаёт удивлять и на все 146% оправдывает все полученные ею титулы, вплоть до "лучшая игра десятилетия". После прохождения этой игры (от которой я не мог оторваться) я пошел в одиночную кампанию Battlefield 4, и меня, если честно, от нелогичности и напыщенности происходящего по сценарию и откровенной однообразности геймплея начинало тошнить.
Half-Life 2 выделяется на фоне других шутеров сразу по нескольким факторам: 1) Игра до сих пор выглядит неплохо, а как она выглядела в сравнении с другими играми в далеком 2004 году страшно себе представить. Если прибавить к этому очень неплохую физику (которая явно лучше, нежели в Call of Duty, ибо тонущие под весом героя машины были еще здесь, а в Ghosts это появилось впервые), то в техническом плане игра опередила свое время.
2) Непрерывность повествования: между уровнями даже нет загрузочных экранов в привычном понимании. Переходя на следующий уровень, игра ставится на паузу, и прогружется следующая локация, создавая эффект целостности игрового мира, причем во многих случаях можно вернуться назад. Также это подчеркивает кратковременность всего происходящего (ну, если не принимать в расчет скачек на неделю вперед, который, впрочем, Гордон и Алекс даже не заметили).
3) Эта игра заставляет думать. Уровни наполнены множеством головоломок, решение которых всячески задействуют особенности и возможности движка Source (который, кстати, использует свеженький Titanfall, пусть и усовершеноствованный).
4) Неплохой сюжет, в котором обошлось без ляпов и откровенного бреда, которого в том же самом Battlefield 4, о котором я говорил в начале, предостаточно.
Моя оценка ей - 10\10.

O Jogo é... Iria ser censurado dizer hehe, mas dizer que é bom apenas não basta, Por que é bom ? Não é apenas um bom e velho clássico... 

Quando eu atiro em HL e dou aquele HS o inimigo morre e dá aquele sinal de morte, você sente o tiro...Os "HEAD CRAPS" pulam na tela e eu instintivamente chego o corpo pro lado no susto, e olha que eu não sou daqueles de virar o controle enquanto jogava um jogo de corrida hehehe, nem nos tempos do TOP GEAR hehe, dá muito emoção o game, hj fazem gráficos com tudo mastigado e o que ? 5 horas de diversão na campanha ? 

[b]Quem Ama jogos de FPS ou qualquer gamer que se preze tem a OBRIGAÇÃO de jogar a franquia HALF LIFE !! [/b] O jogo é GRANDE PRA CACETA !! No inicio nós vemos a seleção de capitulos e claro que na 1ª vez só o 1º tá aberto, conforme se avança nos capitulos o resto destrava blz ? Só pra vocês terem ideia, você JOGA JOGA JOGA...e depois quando se dá conta, começou o CAP 2 KKKKKK (mas durante o game você não consegue saber quando muda o capitulo, só vendo na seleção de cap do inicio. Nem lembro se tem 10 ou 12 CAPITULOS...Isso já assusta...A IA do game é boa, dá muita vontade de jogar e avançar com nosso querido Gordon Freeman !! Um belo arsenal...Bom tempos em que se carregava Vários tipos de arma para serem usadas nos momentos em que o JOGADOR QUISER e não quando a MAQUINA OBRIGAR !! VocÊ conta com uma RENCA de cenários, motos aquáticas, veículos, vários inimigos...

Quem quer avaliar o jogo deve saber o ano que ele foi feito e não apenas achar o "atual que você vive" como melhor de tudo...POR QUE NAO É !! DANE-SE OS GRÁFICOS ! Geração preystation de Fezes que não sabem jogar nada...E mesmo gráficos até pros dias atuais, aqui em 2014 Half Life tem....
Excellent in every way...

Half-Life 2 ist einfach ein echt gutes Actionspiel! Das Spiel ist in der first Person und Grafik ist eigentlich recht gut obwohl es im Jahr 2004 erschienen ist! 
So aber jetzt mal zu den Punkteverteilung! =) (von 0-10 Punkten)
- Grafik = 8 Punkte 
- Steuerung = 9 Punkte (einfache und leichte Steuereung !!Achtung!! ich weiss es nicht wie es bei Gampads ist!!!)
- Spielspass = 10 Punkte ( es macht immer Spass und die Story wird nie langweilig!) 
- Sprache = 10 Punkte ( da es 18 Sprachen gibt)
- Spielstunden = 8 Punkte ( da man schon einige Zeit braucht bis man das Spiel durch hat) 
- Steam Errungenschaften = 10 Punkte ( da es ja von Valve programmiert worden ist und dadurch auch Steam Errungeschaften gibt macht es wesentlich mehr Spass) 
- Story = 10 Punkte ( die Story wird nie langweilig!!) 
Fazit: 

Im großen und ganzen ist das Spiel ein echt gutes Action Shooter Game das wirklich (meiner Meinung nach) immer noch in die Top 10 soll! Das Spiel macht spass und es wird einen nie langweilig! Das gute an Half-Life 2 ist das man auch mit Fahrzeugen (wzb. Wasserfahrzeug, etc. fahren kann!). 
Also ich finde das ist eine Kaufempfehlung und rate jeden das er es mal spielen muss! Ich freue mich schon auf den Teil 3 (Half-Life 3), dass hoffentlich bald erscheinen wird.

Игра шикарная. Каждый должен пройти её хоть раз.

Подходил к концу 2016 года, а халфа всё так же хороша!

简直神作，良心作，简体中文加中文语音有多亲切多感动我就不说了，光游戏流程就有够你玩的不亦乐乎了，我第一次玩选的困难模式，用了24+小时才通关。地图场景宏大，几乎没有重复的地方，而且前进的路并不是显而易见的铺开让你走，你需要细心观察寻找，类似什么机关阀门之类的，有的地方设计的很巧妙。

不同于其他FPS一味突突突突，Half-Life 2游戏元素相当丰富相当有意思。重力枪就是其中的代表。让我印象最深的是水障碍区开飞艇跟捕食者直升机的追逐战，水路复杂难驾驶不说，沿途还有各种机枪，导弹伺候着你，多么扣人心弦，多么惊心动魄，是其他快餐游戏难以给予的。

Half-Life 2枪械子弹数量和血量都很有限，需要通过沿途打砸箱子或寻找秘密补给点补充，所以要求玩家精准细瞄，善于利用场景物体，比如说利用好重力枪可以节省不少弹药，在面对步步逼近的怪物群时不要慌张的乱开枪。

可以看出，HL2每一个关卡，每一个敌人都设计得很用心，场景互动性高，玩法有趣不单一，是会让玩家不知不觉就沉浸其中，游戏过后也值得玩家细细回味。通关HL2感觉比看了一场恢弘而震撼的电影还棒。

如果你因为Half-Life 2过时的画面而鄙夷之，我只能说你肤浅，不是个好玩家。像现在某些一味堆砌华丽画面榨取机器性能的3A级大作，可玩性却比不上Half-Life 2

如果你还没玩过Half-Life 2，那还不赶快，没玩过Half-Life 2实在是PC玩家的遗憾。
But of course! One of the best games ever seen: this game has evrything you need! It's a lot of fun!!! :DD

This is one of the most fantastic games ever made. The subtle nature of the storyline and pristine game mechanics seals Half-Life into the greatest shooter hall of fame. The gravity gun alone provides hours of endless entertainment. I always feel that every time I play through this game I can develop new strategies and creative ways to defeat my foes. It only takes moments to be sucked in by the lovely challenges that this game has to offer. If you like to play video games of any genre you should purchase this entire series. For you FPS junkies out there, this is the game to which I compare every shooter I have ever played and in my book it will always be number one.
Solo se puede describir este juego de una manera: E P I C O

If there's anything that I love Valve for, it's developing a great game and then a sequel to that game that completely blows its predecessor out of the water. Okay, so I detest HL1, but that's just because of the inane difficulty. Half-Life 2 is an improvement to its predecessor in every sense of the word. The main thing I praise it for is that it removes something that HL1 should never have had: monotony. Each chapter is completely different from the last and kept managing to astonish me beyond words. Even the engine it runs on runs circles around Half-Life 1's engine. But the real question is, "do I recommend it?" My answer, without a doubt in my mind, is an emphatic yes.

I want to beat this game, just so I can say I can but.... It's just... The most overrated piece of **** I have ever played.

Absolutley fantastic, is what I have to say about Half Life 2. HL2 was beautifully crafted and hand-sculpted as well as its story, the story is amazing in following the life of Gordon Freeman. It did have its points where I didn't know what to do, and it dragged on a bit. But the way they made you hate Dr. Breen (Which I can at times compare to Google+) and love the people in the game so much was beautiful. 9/10
